abstract: Letter from Matthew S Petersen, Caroline C Hunter and Lee E Goodman, Republican members of Federal Election Commission, responds to May 3 article about FEC Chairwoman Ann M Ravel's opinions of agency.
lead_paragraph: Three Republican commissioners of the F.E.C. take issue with the agency’s chairwoman, Ann M. Ravel.

headline.main: Dissension at the Federal Election Commission

snippet: Three Republican commissioners of the F.E.C. take issue with the agency’s chairwoman, Ann M. Ravel.
